Title: Soy Nero
Writer: Rafi Pitts (original story), Rafi Pitts (screenplay), Razvan Radulescu (screenplay)
Actors: Rory Cochrane, Joel McKinnon Miller, Khleo Thomas, Michael Harney
Plot: Nero, a deported Mexican, returns illegally to the U.S in search of his identity. An intimate portrait of a I9 year old Latino, fighting his destiny, whilst witnessing the madness in all the characters he encounters, and the reality that strikes them all.
